column1: Little Goat Diner////This place is to die for. Maybe we were starving or maybe tired of too long wait hours in every other restaurant
column2: but the food was mind blowing. The macho nachos are too heavy to be an appetizer. I had the Fat club 'Sammich' (Sandwich) which was really good
column3: the batter on the fried chicken was also amazing. And if you take a to-go box
column4: you will notice the quality of the to-go box. Its a good place to eat in every sense.
